select count(*) from board b, member m where b.m_no=m.m_no
and (subject like '%'||#{searchTxt}||'%' or content like '%'||#{searchTxt}||'%')
and (subject like '%'||#{searchTxt}||'%' or content like '%'||#{searchTxt}||'%') and del_yn = 'n'
and subject like '%'||#{searchTxt}||'%' and del_yn = 'n'
and content like '%'||#{searchTxt}||'%' and del_yn = 'n'
and m_nick like '%'||#{searchTxt}||'%' and del_yn = 'n'

select * from (select rownum rn, a.* from (select b.*, m.m_nick as m_nick, (select count(*) from board_reply br where b.no=br.no and re_del_yn='n') as replycount, length(subject) as sublength from board b, member m where b.m_no=m.m_no and del_yn='n'
and (subject like '%'||#{searchTxt}||'%' or content like '%'||#{searchTxt}||'%')
and (subject like '%'||#{searchTxt}||'%' or content like '%'||#{searchTxt}||'%')
and subject like '%'||#{searchTxt}||'%'
and content like '%'||#{searchTxt}||'%'
and m.m_nick like '%'||#{searchTxt}||'%'
order by no desc) a) where rn between #{startRow} and #{endRow}
mapper.update: update board set readcount=readcount+1 where no=#{no}
mapper.select: select b.*, m.m_nick as m_nick, vsize(content) as byteSize from board b, member m where b.no=#{no} and b.m_no=m.m_no
mapper.update: update board set re_step=re_step+1 where ref=#{ref} and re_step>#{re_step}
update board set del_yn='y' where no=#{no}
update board_reply set re_del_yn='y' where no=#{no}
mapper.select: select count(*) from board b, (select ref , re_level from board where no = #{no}) a where b.ref=a.ref and a.re_level+1 = b.re_level and del_yn='n'
select count(*) as reflimit from board where ref=#{ref} and del_yn='n'
